wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Cayley Headlam  (2 August 1862 – 17 January 1947) was an English theologian who served as Bishop of Gloucester from 1923 to 1945.

response: Arthur Headlam and James Wycliffe Headlam were both born in the village.
* 17 January – Arthur Headlam, theologian and Bishop of Gloucester (born 1862)
